## Purpose

This document provides structured instructions and context to support AI (Artificial Intelligence) tools such as GitHub Copilot.

### Instructions for AI

- Follow the coding style guidelines specified in the repository.
- Prioritize writing clean, modular, and maintainable code.
- Always include inline comments for complex logic to ensure that it is understandable.

### Notes

This structured context serves as a guiding principle for new AI tools in the repository, augmenting auto-generated code with repository-specific standards.
